overview: Witch Anggun (Devi Ivonne) is always on the lookout for beautiful young women to sacrifice. She thinks she finds the perfect new sacrifice in fellow witch Ayu (Hazni Zulaikah H), who's looking to give up her evil ways. However, it proves to not be such an easy task as Ayu has a mystical protector named Iman (Harry Capri).
title: The Cursed Teacher
